channel.title: How to add a Gambling Chest to a Pi [OverloadX] Base [PI] Repp++
channel.description:
Can anyone tell me how to add this.
or give me a good tutorial i searshed in searsh bar, and only found delta ones......
so if someone find a good one for Pi or tell me himself how to do this repp++

item.title: How to add a Gambling Chest to a Pi [OverloadX] Base [PI] Repp++
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:3, topic:397045”][quote author=Marine5287 link=topic=494200.msg3613003#msg3613003 date=1306754423]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ That’s supposed to work on any Source.
[/quote]

so i only have to edit all those codes to for exmaple c.sM(“Sorry you had bad luck! Better luck next time!”);[/quote]

Yes you need to change the method names to whatever is appropriate for your server.

Read full topic
